headline: Is Equifax Now A Value Opportunity After Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: Wondering if Equifax is quietly turning into a value opportunity or still priced for perfection? This breakdown will help you decide whether the current share price makes sense. Despite long term gains of 10.5% over 3 years and 20.8% over 5 years, the stock is down about 16.5% year to date and 19.8% over the last year, with the past week and month roughly flat at around 0%. Much of this pullback reflects shifting sentiment around data security and regulatory scrutiny, as investors reassess...
